answers.answer: They want to test your blood yes. Good luck!
Yes they check your blood 3 times they should tell you to be prepare to stay there for about 3 hours
Yeah you will probably get blood drawn and drink the drink every time. I had mine done and had to do the 3hr test and thats what they did

Ooooh, boo this *****. Lol I'm tired and hungry and that stuff made my tummy feel yucky and my baby girl is moving like crazy. Lol I have my alarms set and will be napping in my vehicle. :-) thank you for the confirmation ladies.

question: So I'm at the Drs office right now. Had to drink that sugar water stuff. It actually wasn't bad. I was told to be seen again at 10:10 and 11:10 and not to leave. Why? Do they do blood work at those times or more sugar water?  I've seen post of the mothers to be hating the taste but not this other stuff. My mom is mad I have to be here all day cause I have work after. Said she never had to do it.
title: Diabetes torture
